dependencies.description:
The FASTX-Toolkit is a collection of command line tools for Short-Reads
FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing.
dependencies.name: fastx-toolkit

dependencies.description:
HMMER is used for searching sequence databases for sequence homologs,
and for making sequence alignments. It implements methods using
probabilistic models called profile hidden Markov models (profile HMMs).
dependencies.name: hmmer

dependencies.description:
Improved software detection and extraction of ITS1 and ITS2 from
ribosomal ITS sequences of fungi and other eukaryotes for use in
environmental sequencing
dependencies.name: itsx

dependencies.description:
The BIOM file format (canonically pronounced biome) is designed to be a
general-use format for representing biological sample by observation
contingency tables.
dependencies.name: py-biom-format

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A progress bar for Python 2 and Python 3
dependencies.name: py-progressbar2

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description: Collection of commonly used RDP Tools for easy building.
dependencies.name: rdptools

dependencies.description:
seqkit: a cross-platform and ultrafast toolkit for FASTA/Q file
manipulation
dependencies.name: seqkit

dependencies.description: VSEARCH is a versatile open-source tool for metagenomics.
dependencies.name: vsearch

description: Automated pipeline for analyses of fungal ITS from the Illumina
name: py-pipits

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
